display_long_description:
❄️ Beat the winter blues. All winter long, Maloka's entire mindfulness library is FREE!

🌱 About Maloka, where practice meets play

Travel to your own personal island and embark on an immersive mindfulness journey like no other. Maloka’s enchanting visuals maximize activation of low Beta and Theta brain waves, helping to easily bring you into a state of flow.

Find what moves you through some of our favorite experiences, like:

- Breathwork
- Body scans
- Sound baths

As your journey unfolds, watch your island flourish into a vibrant oasis of plants, sculptures, and more. And you’re never alone: when you join the Malokaverse, you’ll unite with your own personal Spirit who grows with you—from cute and curious, to confident and calm.

🧘‍♂️ Practice with inspiring teachers

Each experience is guided by renowned mindfulness teachers. Find an approach that works for you with 100+ unique experiences guided by partners including:
• Sharon Salzberg
• The Big Quiet
• Max Lowenstein
• Liza Kindred
• Many more!


💫 Maloka VR and mobile app

Maloka exists in the mindful metaverse. We believe that VR is a unique tool that helps to cultivate a sense of focus with ease, grounding you in the present moment with immersive visual and auditory stimulation —ultimately making mindfulness practices more effective.

In addition to the VR game, you can take Maloka everywhere by pairing your Meta Quest app with the mobile app.

Enter your personal island and begin your self-growth journey today!
